subject: Re: movie list addenda
msgSnippet: Musa: The Warrior - a Korean period epic set in 14th-century China about a group of Korean envoys and their escort trying to get back to Korea after their
messageBody:
'Musa: The Warrior' - a Korean period epic set in 14th-century China
about a group of Korean envoys and their escort trying to get back to
Korea after their arrest and exile by the Chinese.

Thomas
